div.pre: 2216 Burgio, SE Sicily betw. Pachino and (1003) Ispica, 1902 Burial: c. 215 B.C. (K) Contents: c. 3000 AE. In two amphorae, c. 30 kg. Hieron II (Poseidon/trident, very large numbers; Apollo/horse, very few) Hieronymus (portrait/thunderbolt, a few) Disposition: private coll., the majority; Syracuse 20 Orsi, NSc 1903, p. 429 Cesano, StudNum (1940), i, p. 64 (as Ragusa) Currò Pisanò, AIIN 1962-4, p. 222 Noe lists this hd. as Spaccaforno (mod. Ispica)
